1370: Segher moved to Scherbier straet.B.2 after marriage.

Had a daughter with Ryccie, Uergina, at age 31.
1371: Had a son with Ryccie, Trueb, at age 32.
1372: Had a daughter with Ryccie, Heylewigis, at age 33.
1373: Lost son Hildebrandus when Hildebrandus was 0 years old.

1379: Had a son with Ryccie, Blankard, at age 40.

1384: Had a daughter with Ryccie, Itsburgis, at age 45.
